jules.title: WO-116_Stop_Money_Leaks_V2
jules.instruction: Plug critical money leaks by replacing direct mutations with SettlementSystem.transfer. Reference WO-116-Asset-Mutation-Cleanup.md. 1. Inheritence/M&A: Replace `deceased._sub_assets()` or `predator.assets -=` with `settlement.transfer()`. 2. FinanceDept: Use settlement for dividends/severance. 3. Normalize TickScheduler: ensure all asset movements happen in Transaction Phase. 4. Verify Zero-Sum with verify_great_reset_stability.py. (God Class Splitting is a separate Phase 2 TODO).
